sub_title: Sales & Marketing Professional l Partnership| Customer success| Ex-Air New Zealand
summary:
With a dynamic and diverse international career spanning various industries (aviation, Real Estate, Luxury Hotels and FMCG). I thrive on the challenges of sales & marketing, project management, and customer success. My journey has been anything but linear, and that's what sets me apart. I possess an innate passion for problem-solving and a relentless drive to elevate situations beyond their initial state. What truly ignites my enthusiasm is thinking beyond conventional boundaries and fearlessly embracing innovative approaches. I excel at harmonising concepts and fostering cohesive teamwork to achieve shared objectives. 

Crafting connections is my superpower, I have a natural apt in uniting cross-functional teams, streamlining productivity, and inspiring collaboration through effective communication, empowerment and teamwork, which drives remarkable business success and enhances customer satisfaction.

I'm eager to connect with like-minded professionals and explore new opportunities in Amsterdam. I can't wait to see what exciting ventures lie ahead.

Skill sets:
*Strong commercial acumen with proven ability to proactively grow, establish and maintain strong client relationships focus on delivery of value and tangible outcomes for all stakeholders.
*Effective communicator and influencer, confident in aligning strategic objectives in order to deliver optimal business outcomes.
*Experienced in overseeing and managing projects, marketing campaigns, budgets, and strategic partnerships to achieve business objectives. 
*Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to operate effectively in ambiguous situations and across complex environments.
*Effective interpersonal communication skills and People Management. 
*Fluency in English, Mandarin and basic Spanish.

school.name: Baradene College of the Sacred Heart

profile_positions.description:
Headhunted to join one of New Zealand's largest privately owned Real Estate company.  

I served as a liaison between the Head Office and 26 branches across Auckland, managing a portfolio of clients internally and externally. My primary objective is to ensure that customers achieve their desired outcomes while using the company's recommended products and services. 

In this role, I acted as an advocate for the marketing team's products and services, working closely with internal departments and external suppliers to provide support and guidance through a consultative, solution-based approach. I collaborate closely with branch managers and sales agents to recommend the best approach for project management, campaign/brand and design briefing, social media, supplier relationship management, and training to ensure the best outcome and ROI for customers.

My focus was on building long-term relationships with customers, proactively identifying and addressing any issues, providing regular updates and reports, and engaging with key stakeholders to ensure that their needs are met. Overall, my role was crucial in driving customer success and ensuring the continued growth of the company's partnerships.
profile_positions.title: Account Relationship/ Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description: After being made redundant from Air New Zealand during the pandemic, I successfully transitioned to the residential property market by leveraging my skills in sales, marketing, stakeholder and product management. I excel at selling off-plan townhouses, managing the sales cycle, and identifying new business prospects.
profile_positions.title: Sales Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Commercial Partnership Manager of Air New Zealand’s award winning Airpoints programme- 🏆winner of Best Loyalty Programme and receiver of the overall Grand Prix award at the 2017 New Zealand Direct Marketing Awards.

Responsible for the development of the Sales & Marketing and Partnership activities (support, assist, plan & execute) with both internal and external stakeholders to optimise the sales performance of the loyalty partnerships. Activities include multichannel campaigns, planning, budgeting, promotional offer creation, campaign analysis, project management, operational support and partnership implementation coordination and partnership management analysis. 
🔗 https://www.airnewzealand.co.nz/airpoints-partners
profile_positions.title: Commercial Partnership Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the success of Air New Zealand Business Loyalty Programme- "Above & Beyond." The primary focus of this role is to enhance customer loyalty, drive market share, increase revenue, and ensure effective brand representation at trade and industry events.

Key responsibilities:
-Portfolio customer relationship management
-Sales strategic planning and customer delivery to drive market share and revenue
-Marketing and digital management 
-Project management 
-Customer success 
-Brand representation at key trade and industry events
-Event management
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Programme Delivery Executive

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Air New Zealand's Premium Customers Loyalty Programmes, in charge of product planning and marketing. This includes managing the product throughout the Product Lifecycle, gathering and prioritising product and customer requirements, defining the product vision, and working closely with internal departments (solutions architect, IT, Product Owners, C-Levels) to deliver winning products. This included implementing high value customer engagement strategies/product launches, utilising multiple digital and printed channels such as DM, solus eDM, mobile app, and online. 
🔗 https://www.airnewzealand.co.nz/status-points
profile_positions.title: Product Manager- Premium Customer Loyalty Programme

profile_positions.description: I joined Delegat Wine Estate after returning from Sydney in order to  diversify my skill sets into FMCG. I managed all facets of the administrational functions: inventory and database management, order processing, customer services, project management, events and sales function for the National Sales team to support the team to deliver on strategic global initiatives and revenue targets.
profile_positions.title: National Sales Administrations Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for promoting and supporting all sales and marketing activities related to the Corporate, MICE and Travel Trade within Australasia and North America. Demonstrated ability in nurture positive and engaged relationships through effectively managing key account relationships with local and international partners via effective portfolio management for all sales and marketing activities related to the Corporate, Events and Travel Trade within Australasia and North America.
profile_positions.title: Sales Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
South America Tours provides bespoke vacations to Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru, Ecuador and Amazon Rain forest. 

After taking a sabbatical travelling through South America for 6 months, I took up the opportunity to share my experience and passion with like minded travelers by becoming a travel sales consultant, designing bespoke South American holidays tailored to a clients’ needs, travel styles and preferences. I had the privilege of weaving their dream itineraries from all touch points- accommodations, tours, transport (land/air) to recommending local sights and hidden gems.
profile_positions.title: Travel Sales Consultant

profile_positions.description:
I was an integral part of the opening team to re-establish market presence post 10 months hotel closure. 

Implemented pre-opening sales & marketing strategies, contracting, business development, events management, customer relationship management, project management and executed customer success delivery strategies.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description: My main duty was to assist customers with planning and booking reservations, travel itineraries, selling rooms and service to prospective customers via various communication channels.  Maintained and provided administrative support to the Director of Rooms Division to execute integrated promotional plans to ensure quality review and presentation of documents, events and communication which maximise overall Room revenue growth.
profile_positions.title: Reservation Sales Agent

profile_positions.description:
An exclusive award winning Relais & Châteaux Five-Star luxury resort well recognized by Travel + Leisure as one of the best hotels of the world.   

Participated in 8 months Management Trainee Programme, trained in all aspect of the hotel operations including Event, unique Customer Experience, Food & Beverage, Front Office, Housekeeping and observation of Sales and Marketing reporting and strategies.

Responsible for designing, planning and executing customer experience (reservation, events, menus, activities) to ensure customer expectation are exceeded each time.

Maintained Guests’ profile data base/reports to ensure each guests’ preferences is kept up to date, as all aspects of a guest’s stay is customised including cuisine, wine, bedding, and activities.
profile_positions.title: Management Intern

profile_positions.description:
Award Winning 5 Star Business Hotel with 410 rooms located within Auckland's CBD. 
(Internship as part of the curriculum of completing International Hotel and Tourism Management degree).

My responsibilities were assisting the Outlet Manager with daily restaurant operations/functions, ensuring daily balance of all restaurant transactions, stock control, roster, and handled guest complaints and concerns.
profile_positions.title: Restaurant Cashier
